faction.name: Federal States-Army
faction.description: The Federal States-Army (F.S-A.) constitutes the land and air troops of the Armed Forces of the Intermarine Federation. Its subordinate branches include the States-Army Air Corps (F.S.A.A.C.), the Ready Reserve, and the Whitewater Guard state militia. Included also are units from the Expeditionary Corps (F.E.C.). It is the largest, most well-armed, and least orderly collection of thieves, drunkards, smugglers, and friends of liberty between the Sea of Lights and the Sea of Masts.

specialRules.name: Assault Dismount
specialRules.description: Federal regular infantry fight under armour until the last moment: disembarking into fire, supported by their carrier's weaponry.

specialRules.name: Chemical-SP (X")
specialRules.description: Gas shells enriched with silver particulate "confetti" are notorious for their hideous effects against unprotected lupar: silver destroys cursed flesh.

specialRules.name: Sprint Motor
specialRules.description: Space Corps rockeet motors bridge the gap between old and new - at least until their fuel runs out.

specialRules.name: Steel Watchbands
specialRules.description: Federal tankers excel at firing shot after accurate shot while rolling onwards.

units.name: EXPEDITIONARY COMMAND SQUAD
units.unitAbility: All units targeted in a Brigade (including self) lose all pin tokens.

units.name: PUP CARSON SCOUTS
units.unitAbility: Any Tracked with at least M6" which this unit embarks or desants on can make a "pathfinder move" during Maneuver Phase which is only M6" but ignores terrain entrance/exit costs and all terrain multipliers.

units.name: INTERMARINE RANGERS
units.unitAbility: This Unit does not lose accuracy from pin tokens while it is not identified.
